thresholding

Class LocalThresholding

  • java.lang.Object
    • thresholding.LocalThresholding

  • public class LocalThresholding
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for thresholding and finding the difference between images
    Author:
    MMB

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalThresholding

        public LocalThresholding()
        Creates a thresholder with default parameters

      • LocalThresholding

        public LocalThresholding(int blurRadius,
                         int despeckleRadius,
                         int thresholdRadius,
                         double thresholdParameter1,
                         double thresholdParameter2)
        Creates a thresholder with custom parameters
        Parameters:
        blurRadius - radius of gaussian blur (default value 3)
        despeckleRadius - radius of median filter (default value 5)
        thresholdRadius - radius of Phansalkar threshold (default value 15)
        thresholdParameter1 - Phansalkar threshold k (default value 0.1)
        thresholdParameter2 - Phansalkar threshold r (default value 0.4)

    • Method Detail

      • getThresholdedImage

        public ij.ImagePlus getThresholdedImage(ij.ImagePlus src)
        Gets thresholded image as ImagePlus
        Parameters:
        src - source image
        Returns:
        thresholded image

      • combined

        public double combined(ij.ImagePlus src1,
                       ij.ImagePlus src2)
        Calculates number of pixels difference between the thresholds of two imagepluses
        Parameters:
        src1 - first image
        src2 - second image
        Returns:
        difference

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String source,
                 java.lang.String dest,
                 java.lang.String fileName,
                 int slice)
        Saves a slice as a tif
        Parameters:
        source - source file path (should end in .avi)
        dest - destination (folder)
        fileName - destination file name (no extension)
        slice - index of slice to be saved
